video.title: Scandal
video.synopsis: A powerful team of Washington, D.C. lawyers makes scandals disappear while handling government crises and coping with problems of their own.

episodes.synopsis: When a young lawyer starts a new job at a crisis management firm, she must deal with an accusation against the nation's president on her first day.
episodes.title: Sweet Baby

episodes.synopsis: Olivia must protect a new client who is under investigation; Quinn runs into trouble.
episodes.title: Dirty Little Secrets

episodes.synopsis: The team tries to help a millionaire's son who has been accused of rape.
episodes.title: Hell Hath No Fury

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and Cyrus get into a heated argument about the Amanda Tanner case; the team helps a dictator who claims his wife and children were kidnapped.
episodes.title: Enemy of the State

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and her team help defend the pilot of a commercial plane that crashed, killing everyone on board.
episodes.title: Crash and Burn

episodes.synopsis: Gideon investigates Amanda's past. Flashbacks reveal Olivia and Fitz's first meeting on the campaign trail and the formation of Pope & Associates.
episodes.title: The Trail

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and the team rally when Quinn finds herself in a tragic situation; Cyrus turns to Olivia when an announcement affects Fitz's presidency.
episodes.title: Grant: For the People

episodes.synopsis: Details about Quinn's past are revealed; a senator faces public disgrace; Cyrus and Mellie put President Fitz into a compromising position.
episodes.title: White Hat's Off

episodes.synopsis: The team does heavy lifting to clean up the mess after a public figure is caught in a compromising position; Cyrus and Fitz deal with an emergency.
episodes.title: The Other Woman

episodes.synopsis: A government employee shocks Olivia when he reveals how high up the scandal goes; questions about Quinn's background create tension.
episodes.title: Hunting Season

episodes.synopsis: The parents of a missing college student seek help; David gets help on the Cytron case from an unexpected source; Mellie proves her political prowess.
episodes.title: Beltway Unbuckled

episodes.synopsis: A governor takes the law into his own hands; when James returns to his job as a White House reporter, both Cyrus and the President are surprised.
episodes.title: All Roads Lead to Fitz

episodes.synopsis: Olivia receives a coded warning that could expose Huck's past; Fitz and Cyrus face the ramifications of James's front-page news story.
episodes.title: Spies Like Us

episodes.synopsis: The team manages a billionaire who seems to have lost his sanity; Olivia and the White House staff prepare to celebrate the president's 50th birthday.
episodes.title: Defiance

episodes.synopsis: A catastrophic event forces Olivia to go back to work at the White House; the first few days of Fitz's presidency unfold.
episodes.title: Happy Birthday, Mr. President

episodes.synopsis: Olivia helps the vice president; Cyrus learns the truth about James's investigation; Olivia's associates struggle with an unexpected betrayal.
episodes.title: Blown Away

episodes.synopsis: While Huck is held under the Patriot Act, Olivia and the team gets assistance from an old friend; Mellie faces an issue that may impact Fitz's future.
episodes.title: One for the Dog

episodes.synopsis: The White House is rocked by more changes; flashbacks reveal more about the corrupt election; Edison makes a shocking accusation.
episodes.title: A Criminal, a Whore, an Idiot and a Liar

episodes.synopsis: Olivia unravels as her colleagues learn the truth about the rigged election; Mellie tries to reel Fitz in.
episodes.title: Truth or Consequences

episodes.synopsis: David learns the truth about the Cytron case; Olivia, Cyrus, Mellie, Hollis and Verna go to extremes to protect themselves.
episodes.title: Nobody Likes Babies

episodes.synopsis: Fitz doesn't know who he can trust; a handsome stranger sparks Olivia's interest; the team at Pope & Associates works for David Rosen on a case.
episodes.title: Whiskey Tango Foxtrot

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and the team end up acting as high-powered matchmakers for an up-and-coming politician; Fitz is faced with a delicate hostage situation.
episodes.title: Boom Goes the Dynamite

episodes.synopsis: Fitz's pick for Supreme Court Justice is caught in an affair with Olivia's new high-powered client; Olivia and Jake continue to flirt.
episodes.title: Top of the Hour

episodes.synopsis: Hollis Doyle's daughter is abducted; Jake and Olivia take their relationship to the next step; Cyrus wants to get back in the president's good graces.
episodes.title: Snake in the Garden

episodes.synopsis: The team may have made a mistake on an old case; Olivia and Jake's relationship intensifies, while Fitz and Mellie's relationship hits a low.
episodes.title: Molly, You in Danger, Girl

episodes.synopsis: Information about Huck's past is revealed; not realizing that someone could be watching, Fitz and Olivia have an emotionally charged conversation.
episodes.title: Seven Fifty-Two

episodes.synopsis: The team makes a shocking discovery while investigating the mole; Fitz orders Jake to keep Olivia safe; Cyrus must clean up after Mellie's ultimatum.
episodes.title: A Woman Scorned

episodes.synopsis: Cyrus is at the center of a big scandal at the White House; Olivia is betrayed by someone close to her.
episodes.title: Any Questions?

episodes.synopsis: Close to uncovering the mole's identity, Olivia and her team find themselves in increasing danger; the latest scandal pushes Cyrus over the edge.
episodes.title: White Hat's Back On

episodes.synopsis: An unexpected allegiance is formed as Pope and Associates and the White House face their biggest scandal. Olivia learns what her father is capable of.
episodes.title: It's Handled

episodes.synopsis: Flashbacks reveal more about Olivia's relationship with her father. The White House and Pope and Associates work to clean up the mess they created.
episodes.title: Guess Who's Coming to Dinner

episodes.synopsis: A mother from the Midwest hires Pope and Associates under mysterious conditions to manage a private family matter that threatens to blow up.
episodes.title: Mrs. Smith Goes to Washington

episodes.synopsis: Pope and Associates agrees to work with a philandering senator who has taken explicit photos of himself. Mellie ends up in a scandal of her own.
episodes.title: Say Hello to My Little Friend

episodes.synopsis: The team covers up a secret for Congresswoman Josie Marcus, while Olivia and Mellie have a run-in during the White House Correspondents' Dinner.
episodes.title: More Cattle, Less Bull

episodes.synopsis: Olivia faces a decision that will affect her White House relationships. Harrison's loyalty is tested as Cyrus and Mellie scheme against Josie Marcus.
episodes.title: Icarus

episodes.synopsis: Mellie plays up to the press to try to restore her public image. As Huck pushes Quinn away, her bloodlust threatens to put her in danger.
episodes.title: Everything's Coming Up Mellie

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and the team must manage a potential crisis with the Josie Marcus campaign while investigating Operation Remington.
episodes.title: Vermont Is for Lovers, Too

episodes.synopsis: As the team gets closer to the truth, loyalties are tested and relationships are pushed to the limit. Cyrus realizes that he may have gone too far.
episodes.title: YOLO

episodes.synopsis: Sally turns to Cyrus for help in covering up what happened to Daniel. Olivia learns the truth about her mother's intentions.
episodes.title: A Door Marked Exit

episodes.synopsis: The White House deals with a bombshell announcement from Sally Langston. Olivia is shocked when she finds out who's the new leader of B-613.
episodes.title: Ride, Sally, Ride

episodes.synopsis: Fitz faces a harsh reality when old feelings and jealousy arise at an event. Leo arranges a meeting between Sally and an old friend.
episodes.title: We Do Not Touch the First Ladies

episodes.synopsis: Fitz gets thrown a curve ball during the first presidential debate. Olivia is shocked to learn about Sally's role in the death of Daniel Douglas.
episodes.title: No Sun on the Horizon

episodes.synopsis: Sally arranges a meeting with the NRA, sending the White House into a tailspin. Cyrus throws himself into his work to cope with his grief.
episodes.title: Kiss Kiss Bang Bang

episodes.synopsis: Fitz and Mellie's kids prepare for an interview, but Olivia senses something is wrong. Maya issues a warning to Olivia to steer clear of her business.
episodes.title: Mama Said Knock You Out

episodes.synopsis: Abby takes on Olivia's duties at the White House as the team continues its B-613 investigation. Fitz issues an ultimatum to Andrew.
episodes.title: The Fluffer

episodes.synopsis: Mellie asks for Olivia's help in handling a paternity test. The team must spring into action following a security breach.
episodes.title: Flesh and Blood

episodes.synopsis: Cyrus struggles with whether to tell anyone about a ticking time bomb. As election day nears, Fitz and Mellie come to grips with a shocking tragedy.
episodes.title: The Price of Free and Fair Election

episodes.synopsis: Olivia returns from her extended sojourn overseas to find her team scattered, and Fitz and Mellie struggle to deal with the tragic loss of their son.
episodes.title: Randy, Red, Superfreak and Julia

episodes.synopsis: Olivia works to get a high-profile, quarreling couple to attend the State of the Union speech, and Mellie's fragile mental condition deteriorates.
episodes.title: The State of the Union

episodes.synopsis: Fitz hits a roadblock in his efforts to get gun control on the books, and Olivia helps an old law school friend whose daughter goes missing.
episodes.title: Inside the Bubble

episodes.synopsis: Fitz's daughter becomes embroiled in a sex-tape scandal, and Jake discovers the truth of Jerry's death but soon finds himself accused of the murder.
episodes.title: Like Father, Like Daughter

episodes.synopsis: Refusing to confess to Jerry's murder, Jake faces the wrath of Fitz firsthand. Meanwhile, Mellie starts to come to terms with her grief.
episodes.title: The Key

episodes.synopsis: Olivia takes on the case of a convicted assassin who claims to be innocent, and Elizabeth tries to sabotage Fitz in the press.
episodes.title: An Innocent Man

episodes.synopsis: The team works to derail Abby's ex-husband's bid to win a U.S. Senate seat, and Olivia gets personal to find out who really killed Jerry.
episodes.title: Baby Made a Mess

episodes.synopsis: Olivia and the team try to take down Rowan, and Mellie admits her feelings for Andrew after an attempt is made on his life.
episodes.title: The Last Supper

episodes.synopsis: Rowan orders B613 to be shut down and its agents terminated, and Elizabeth leaks photos that prompt Cyrus to quit his job as Fitz's chief of staff.
episodes.title: Where the Sun Don't Shine

episodes.synopsis: Masked men abduct Olivia and hold her in an abandoned building, from which she escapes -- only to discover a deeper conspiracy at work.
episodes.title: Run

episodes.synopsis: The kidnappers use Olivia to coerce Fitz into declaring war on West Angola while the team pulls out all the stops to find and rescue her.
episodes.title: Where's the Black Lady?

episodes.synopsis: The team attempts to infiltrate the international bidding war for Olivia, and Fitz tries to force Andrew to resign the vice presidency.
episodes.title: Gladiators Don't Run

episodes.synopsis: The black-market auction for Olivia escalates, prompting Cyrus to formulate a desperate plan. Meanwhile, Mellie schemes against Andrew.
episodes.title: No More Blood

episodes.synopsis: When the shooting of an unarmed teenager near the White House sparks race-related outrage, Olivia gets involved to uncover the truth.
episodes.title: The Lawn Chair

episodes.synopsis: Huck is moved to testify about his traumatic time with B613 after Kim digs into the unit's files, and Susan is sworn in as vice president.
episodes.title: The Testimony of Diego Munoz

episodes.synopsis: When a woman threatens to expose top politicians' secrets with a tell-all book, Olivia and her team scramble to keep the manuscript under wraps.
episodes.title: It's Good to Be Kink

episodes.synopsis: Olivia contends with PTSD brought on by her kidnapping, and Cyrus and Michael move up the date of their wedding in the wake of another sex scandal.
episodes.title: Put a Ring on It

episodes.synopsis: Former B613 agents turn up dead as David bolsters his case, and Olivia tries to stop the execution of a man who killed his daughter's abuser.
episodes.title: Honor Thy Father

episodes.synopsis: Jake faces danger when Olivia refuses to drop the case against B613, and Fitz and Susan clash over impending gun control legislation.
episodes.title: I'm Just a Bill

episodes.synopsis: To save Jake's life, Olivia agrees to help a troublesome former KGB agent. Meanwhile, Mellie faces obstacles in her race for the Senate.
episodes.title: First Lady Sings the Blues

episodes.synopsis: Olivia helps a woman in the Navy who was sexually assaulted and became pregnant, and Russell faces torture over his involvement with B613.
episodes.title: A Few Good Women

episodes.synopsis: The jurors hearing David's case against B613 all turn up murdered, and Fitz and Olivia reunite after Mellie moves out of the White House.
episodes.title: You Can't Take Command
